articles.title: Dont ask Covid-19 positive employees to produce medical certs: Singapore minister - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): All employers here should not request medical certificates from workers who test positive for Covid-19 as the healthcare system continues to face stresses from rising infections amid the Omicron wave, Manpower …

articles.author: Laura He
articles.title: Asian markets, Dow futures rebound despite US sanctions on Russia - CNN
articles.description: Asian markets and US stock futures staged a modest rebound on Wednesday, hours after the United States announced its first set of sanctions against Russia for what US President Joe Biden termed "the beginning of a Russian invasion" on Ukraine.

articles.author: Hermes Auto
articles.title: Asia stock markets sink, oil hits 7-year high as Russia-Ukraine crisis escalates - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Brent crude futures jumped to a high of US$97.40 a barrel - their highest since September 2014.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Stock markets across Asia were in a sea of red, while oil prices hit seven-year highs amid the threat of a full-scale invasion of Ukraine by Russia.
